title: One Wrong Move (with Stuart Anderson MP)
itunes:title: One Wrong Move (with Stuart Anderson MP)
description:
Conservative MP Stuart Anderson says the decision not to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine is the right one. Anderson, who sits on the Defence Committee, says a miscalculation at this stage could risk 'full-scale war' across the globe. Plus, has a world order based on stable borders been shattered? Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker are joined by Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
